sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { MDBContainer, MDBBtn, MDBModal, MDBModalBody, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalFooter, MDBInput, MDBIcon } from 'mdbreact'; import DocsLink from '../components/docsLink'; import SectionContainer from '../components/sectionContainer'; class ModalFormPage extends Component { state = { modal1: false, modal2: false, modal3: false, modal4: false, modal5: false }; toggle = nr => () => { const modalNumber = `modal${nr}`; this.setState({ [modalNumber]: !this.state[modalNumber] }); }; render() { const { modal1, modal2, modal3, modal4, modal5, modal6 } = this.state; return ( Launch Modal Login Form Sign in
Login Launch Modal Register Form Sign in
SIGN UP Launch Modal subscription Form Subscribe
Send Launch Modal Contact Form Write to us
Send Launch Modal Login With Avatar
Maria Doe
 Login Launch Modal Subscription Subscribe
Send ); } } export default ModalFormPage;
